parts.text: You are an expert educator and knowledge architect. Analyze the following lecture slides to construct a comprehensive global concept map that serves as the backbone for a spaced repetition deck. - Objectives: Extract explicit learning goals and implicit competency targets. - Concepts: Identify the core entities, theories, and definitions. Prioritize *fundamental* concepts over trivial examples. Assign stable, short, unique IDs. - Relations: Map the *semantic structure* of the domain. Use precise relation types (e.g., `is_a`, `part_of`, `causes`, `precedes`, `contrasts_with`). Note page references for traceability. - Formatting: STRICTLY AVOID Markdown (e.g., **bold**). Use HTML tags for formatting (e.g., bold, italic) within any text fields. Return ONLY a JSON object with keys: objectives (array), concepts (array), relations (array). No prose.

Slide text:
Page 1: Test


[OCR Extracted Content]
